snippet: The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits dropped last week, another indicator that the Fed could soon pull back on its bond-buying program.
abstract: Stocks decline after government reports fewer applications for unemployment benefits and higher quarterly growth, raising fears that Federal Reserve may be moving closer to scaling down its bond-buying program.
lead_paragraph: The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits dropped last week, another indicator that the Fed could soon pull back on its bond-buying program.

headline.main: Wall St. Digests Economic News With Wary Eye on Fed
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Digests Economic News With Wary Eye on Fed
